1.0.0.Author: Stefan Milton Bache <stefan@stefanbache.dk> and<U+000a>Hadley Wickham <h.wickham@gmail.com>
1.0.0.Description: Provides a mechanism for chaining commands with a<U+000a>new forward-pipe operator. Ceci n'est pas un pipe.
1.0.0.Title: magrittr - a forward-pipe operator for R

1.0.1.Author: Stefan Milton Bache <stefan@stefanbache.dk> and<U+000a>Hadley Wickham <h.wickham@gmail.com>
1.0.1.Description: Provides a mechanism for chaining commands with a<U+000a>new forward-pipe operator. Ceci n'est pas un pipe.
1.0.1.Title: magrittr - a forward-pipe operator for R

1.5.Author: Stefan Milton Bache <stefan@stefanbache.dk> and<U+000a>Hadley Wickham <h.wickham@gmail.com>
1.5.Description: Provides a mechanism for chaining commands with a<U+000a>new forward-pipe operator, %>%. This operator will forward a<U+000a>value, or the result of an expression, into the next function<U+000a>call/expression. There is flexible support for the type<U+000a>of right-hand side expressions. For more information, see<U+000a>package vignette.<U+000a>To quote Rene Magritte, "Ceci n'est pas un pipe."
1.5.Title: A Forward-Pipe Operator for R

2.0.1.Author:
Stefan Milton Bache [aut, cph] (Original author and creator of
magrittr),
Hadley Wickham [aut],
Lionel Henry [cre],
RStudio [cph, fnd]
2.0.1.Authors@R:
c(person(given = "Stefan Milton",
family = "Bache",
role = c("aut", "cph"),
email = "stefan@stefanbache.dk",
comment = "Original author and creator of magrittr"),
person(given = "Hadley",
family = "Wickham",
role = "aut",
email = "hadley@rstudio.com"),
person(given = "Lionel",
family = "Henry",
role = "cre",
email = "lionel@rstudio.com"),
person(given = "RStudio",
role = c("cph", "fnd")))
2.0.1.Description:
Provides a mechanism for chaining commands with a
new forward-pipe operator, %>%. This operator will forward a value, or
the result of an expression, into the next function call/expression.
There is flexible support for the type of right-hand side expressions.
For more information, see package vignette.  To quote Rene Magritte,
"Ceci n'est pas un pipe."
2.0.1.Title: A Forward-Pipe Operator for R

2.0.2.Description:
Provides a mechanism for chaining commands with a
new forward-pipe operator, %>%. This operator will forward a value, or
the result of an expression, into the next function call/expression.
There is flexible support for the type of right-hand side expressions.
For more information, see package vignette.  To quote Rene Magritte,
"Ceci n'est pas un pipe."

Provides a mechanism for chaining commands with a new
forward-pipe operator, %>%. This operator will forward a value, or the

There is flexible support for the type of right-hand side expressions.
